name: promise-all-properties
description: A helper function that recevies an object with a promise in each property and returns a promise that resolves to an object with the same properties and the resolved values of the promises

scripts.build: yarn clean && env NODE_ENV=production tsc --project tsconfig.json
scripts.test:once: env NODE_PATH=./src mocha --recursive --require source-map-support/register --require ts-node/register  test/{**/*,**}/*.spec.ts
scripts.test:watch: env NODE_PATH=./src mocha --recursive --reporter spec --require source-map-support/register --require ts-node/register --watch --watch-extensions ts,tsx test/{**/*,**}/*.spec.ts

author: Marcelo Waisman
